content: if using magic loop round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat round 1 until ribbing meas approx 1 /3 cm bobble in pattern www elizabethsmithknits com 5 pattern techniques & tips techniques m1-r make 1 - right leaning with ln pick up strand in-between ln and rn from back to front visit elizabethsmithknits com/mudseason-tips knit into front of this st with rn -1 st increase d for videos & tutorials of all of these techniques and more m1-l make 1 - left leaning with ln pick up long tail cast-on refer to my video tutorial on strand in-between ln and rn from front to back my tips page link above knit into back of this st with rn - 1 st increase d pick-up and knit for neck trim refer to my kfb knit front & back knit the next stitch but video tutorial on my tips page before taking it off of the ln insert the rn tip into the back of the same stitch and then pull the stitch working magic loop for sleeves if you would like off the needle - 1 st increase d to use magic loop for your sleeves rather than use dpn s refer to my video tutorial on my tips page cable cast-on insert rn in-between next 2 sts on ln then wrap yarn around the rn and work just pattern reading tips as you would to knit a stitch but when you pull if in the instructions for your size it says to the loop through place it on the ln repeat a row 0 times it means you won t work that repeat for that size you ll skip that particular ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 sts one at a time repeat as if to knit from ln to rn then insert ln into when you see an x listed it just represents a the fronts of these 2 sts and knit them together - 1 placeholder for the size not affected by the given st decrease d instructions k2tog knit 2 together knit the next 2 sts together - 1 st decrease d abbreviations approx = approximately bobble = bind off bor = beginning of round circ = circular co = cast on decrease d = decrease d increase d = increase d dpn = double pointed needles k = knit ln = left needle meas = measure p = purl pm = place marker repeat = repeat rn = right needle round s = round s rs = right side sm = slip marker st s = stitch es st st = stockinette stitch ws = wrong side www elizabethsmithknits com 6 schematic & finished measurements inches size xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x 6x a bust circumference 33 36 5 38 5 42 45 25 48 5 51 75 54 58 5 63 b back width at bust 16 5 18 25 19 25 21 22 5 24
